text: Tumikhan ke Moi logot pora jui pora sapha kori kene bonai rakha suna kini bole nimite koise, aru etu pora tumikhan dhuni hobole nimite, aru ekdom bhal sapha boga kapra nijor lagai kene tumikhan laga sorom to manu ke nadikha bole nimite koisele, aru suku sapha kori kene dikhi bole nimite bhal molom lobole korisile.
